page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Only 3% of the male population is engaged in agriculture despite the rural location.A greater involvement could be anticipated but with greater mechanisation and an increase in the number of larger sized farm units, there is less agricultural employment available. The major sources of employment are some dozen miles away in{Cheltenham, {Gloucester}& a little nearer, {Tewkesbury.}The chief employers are {Smith's Industries,Dowtys & G.C.H.Q.} with a small number of self-employed businessmen,bank managers & retired people making up the remainder of the population.Most of these people are not indigenous to the area and are basically in the senior executive/ professional roles.These people have settled here since the early 1970's.
